messages.messageBody:
--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Ron Hartmann" <swords@...> wrote:
>
> Kirk -
>
> The catalogue is definitely worthwhile buying! All of us who are
members have taken copies to help support the group, so they will be
available from a number of us. I myself will be selling what extra
copies I've purchased, at cost. I haven't check shipping just yet but
I'll price it at $50 plus shipping. Beautiful printing and binding!
>
> Ron

Ron,
save one copy for me if you have an extra..........

milt

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: KTK Book and reference
messages.msgSnippet: Kirk - The catalogue is definitely worthwhile buying! All of us who are members have taken copies to help support the group, so they will be available from a
messages.messageBody:
Kirk -

The catalogue is definitely worthwhile buying! All of us who are members have taken copies to help support the group, so they will be available from a number of us. I myself will be selling what extra copies I've purchased, at cost. I haven't check shipping just yet but I'll price it at $50 plus shipping. Beautiful printing and binding!

Ron
STL
swords@...

Hi Pete
What is the best way to get a copy?
Kirk

messages.subject: Re: KTK Book and reference
messages.msgSnippet: The Sano book is available on Ebay quite often or you can order direct from: www.sanobi.or.jp The KTK book should be available through: www.bridgeofdreams.com
messages.messageBody:
The Sano book is available on Ebay quite often or you can order direct
from:
www.sanobi.or.jp
The KTK book should be available through:
www.bridgeofdreams.com
www.nihontocraft.com
Danny Massey has a note on his site that he is taking orders and as
Craig Harris is a KTK member he will probably have some through his BOD
site.

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: KTK Book and reference
messages.msgSnippet: You will have to wait for the dealers or members to put them up I think. Craig Harris will have a few I think ??, maybe. Cheers Richard Turner ... [Non-text
messages.messageBody:
You will have to wait for the dealers or members to put them up I think.
Craig Harris will have a few I think ??, maybe.

Cheers

Richard Turner
